name: The Lost Gem Final
description:
An Archaeologist JOHN MAYER lost his wife and daughter and goes in search of a magical Gem that has the power to grant the bearer ONE WISH.... What will his fate be? Find out as you Play as John Mayer in the Adventure of  THE LOST GEM

Arrow Keys to Move, E for Dialogue, Space to Jump, P to access Option menu during game play

Hint: Always Use Keyboard values of the Initials of a button to access it...
